Hellish Resistance Information

Your blood protects you from flame, abyssal or otherwise. You have resistance to Fire and take only half damage from it.

How to unlock Hellish Resistance

Hellish Resistance can be acquired by Tiefling

Hellish Resistance Tips & Notes

This feat does not stack with other potions to make tieflings immune to fire damage. This feat does NOT prevent burning from walking on fire surfaces. Notes & Tips go here
